name: Geomica
description:
A simple yet addicting and amazingly fun game!

Tap to spin the shape and align the colors with the approaching platforms before they arrive!

Sharpen your skills and beat your high score! It never gets old!

It is great to play whether you are on the go or just hanging out.

The game is complete with great sounding music!


Music by musicians listed on the app website: geomica.weebly.com
